pullRequest.body:
`Monotone.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Iio` and `Monotone.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Ioi` assume monotonicity on the whole space, but it is sufficient for the function to be monotone on an interval.

- Add `MonotoneOn.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Ioo_left`,  `MonotoneOn.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Ioo_right`, `MonotoneOn.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Iio` and `MonotoneOn.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Ioi`.
- Simplify the proof of `Monotone.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Iio` using `MonotoneOn.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Iio`.


---

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

Can you add antitone versions of these? These are probably one-liners using `OrderDual`.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10459169038/job/28962538085)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10459169038/job/28962537621)
There doesn't happen to be a duality argument lean would accept?
In the following lemma I managed to use a duality argument, but here I did not find a way to do it
Here I managed to use the same duality argument that is in the proof of `Monotone.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Ioi`.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat (Topology.Order): Generalize `Monotone.tendsto_nhdsWithin_Iio`
